51833.<start_lip_sync n00584 _normal m00001>「ど:
<start_lip_sync n00584 _normal m00001>It appears the Red Goddess Gem has been successfully
offered to the River of Light.<stop_lip_animation n00584 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51834.<start_lip_sync n00584 _normal m00001>「で: <start_lip_sync n00584 _normal m00001>Now, let us offer a good prayer.<stop_lip_animation n00584 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51836.どこからともなく 声が 聞こえてくる。: From out of nowhere, a voice can be heard.

51838.<center>六聖陣は アストルティアに\nあまたいる 英雄 聖者の中から\n:
<center>The Six Saints were born from among the
many heroes and saints in Astoltia, six
of whom were chosen for their excellence.

51839.<center>六聖陣とは 招かれざる魔族どもから\nアストルティアを守る 聖な:
<center>The Six Saints are the holy shield that
protects Astoltia from uninvited demons...

51840.<center>魔族どもの暗躍を阻止せんと 彼らは\n従者である聖使者らを率いて:
<center>To prevent the demons' secret plan, they
led their warriors to the spirit world, and
in exchange for many lives, won the battle.

51841.<center>魔瘴の荒ぶりし時が 巡りくるたび\n新たな六聖陣が生まれ いつ果:
<center>As the time of the demon miasma rages on,
six new saints are born and at the end,
another holy war unfolds...
